        Sets the color of each tile
        Parameters:
        xStart - For this program, we modify starting at x-pixel 0
        yStart - For this program, we modify starting at y-pixel 0
        pixelArrayWidth - Count of pixels in horizontal modification
        pixelArrayHeight - Count of pixels in vertical modification
        tileSet - The set of 9 tiles
